item.description:
Calling all libertarians and liberty activists! A true ally of freedom and liberty, Daniel Fishman, is seeking to restore civil liberties and small government in Massachusetts, the original birthplace of American freedom. Lets send a strong message to the anti-liberty politicians as we gather to collect signatures for Dan to obtain the Massachusetts Senate seat vacated by John Kerry.

We will meetup and gather signatures in the afternoon throughout the Fanueil Hall and Quincy Market vicinity since this is... a very popular destination with a lot of foot traffic. Clip boards, pens, and signing papers are all provided....all you need to bring is your passion and enthusiasm!

Please join us for some or all of it, look forward to seeing all of you there!

more info: https://www.facebook.com/events/424033751016236/?fref=ts
item.name: Signatures for Libertarian senate candidate Daniel Fishman
